price: Indeed, We had given Abraham sound judgment before[22], for We know him well.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: [22] i.e., before Moses, or in his early youth.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
